channel.title: Teacher on Kunjan's Web Space
channel.description: Recent content in Teacher on Kunjan's Web Space

item.title: My Identity
item.description: Few words dedicated to people who made me who I am right now, my teachers. I know few of them personally and few others I am yet to meet in person. But they are still there always for me. Guiding me and helping me whenever and wherever I need. Words are not enough to say Thanks but still here with my small try Here is original Gujarati Version જેને કોઈ ઓળખની જરૂર નથી
